title: Reuters reveals global crop problems point to years of high food prices
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters provided insight into how, from war to wild weather, global crop problems point to years of high food prices. […]

The post Reuters reveals global crop problems point to years of high food prices appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters provided insight into how, from war to wild weather, global crop problems point to years of high food prices. The world has perhaps never seen this level of simultaneous agricultural disruption, according to agriculture executives, industry analysts, farmers and economists, meaning it may take years to return to global food security.

The post Reuters reveals global crop problems point to years of high food prices appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
